title: LeBron: Win or Bust
description:
Jalen & Jacoby talk Lebron James at the Drew League and his win or bust mentality, and if that's a good thing for the Lakers.. Also, James Harden's pay cut for the betterment of the team. Plus, they'll l tell you if the new additions put the 76ers in contention for the championship. And, Kyrie Irving skips out on Drew League after initially committing to playing. Find out why the guys think what he did instead was more important.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
